pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Package for Building Python Extensions to TIBCO SpotfireÂ® This package provides functions used for integrating Python with Spotfire, including: * reading and writing files in Spotfire Binary Data Format (SBDF)* building Spotfire Packages (SPKs) for distributing Python interpreters and custom packages with Spotfire* internal handler code for executing Data Functions from Spotfire### Installation```shpip install spotfire```### LicenseBSD-type 3-Clause License. See the file ```LICENSE``` included in the package.
